poster.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a large printed notice, picture, or photograph, used to advertise something or as a decoration
poster.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A team of volunteers were putting up posters.
a poster campaign for the election
poster.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a large printed notice, used to advertise something
poster.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: an advertising poster for a brand of clothing
